# GRAPHICS::REQUEST_SCALEFORM_SCRIPT_HUD_MOVIE

## Summary
Requests that a scaleform script hud movie is streamed in

## Parameters
* **eSCRIPT_HUD_COMPONENT** componentId: Component id , whether game should stop to load or not (should be streamed where possible)

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Requests that a scaleform script hud movie is streamed in
